name: Camping Pasta with Clam Sauce
author: fabeveryday
summary: This is a great non-perishable meal to make while camping - it uses only dry or canned ingredients!
ingredients: 1 tablespoon seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)
1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 (6.5 ounce) cans chopped clams with juice
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook linguine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes
Combine minced onion, seafood seasoning, oregano, basil, garlic powder, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper in a bowl
Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat
Add onion mixture; cook, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 1 minute
Stir in mushrooms to coat with onion mixture
Bring to a simmer; reduce heat and simmer until flavors combine, about 5 minutes
Toss clam sauce with pasta in a large bowl
